description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically in this cluster, the tags deal with the aquisition and management of organizational systems and organizational system development.
name: SYS-ACQ-AND-DEV

values.description: Information security related requirements are included in the requirements for new information systems or enhancements to existing information systems.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 10.a Information Security Requirements Analysis and Specification
